SIR: 
</p><p>
Enclosed you will find <a href='/results.php?tla=nag' rel='colleague met'>Gen. Greene</a>'s information of the enemy's 
intention. You will, if possible, take your post in <a href='/results.php?city=georgetown' rel='city'>Georgetown</a>, and 
follow the orders given to Lieut. -Col. Badley, as I do not know where 
you are, or if you can possibly take the command. 
I am, your obedient servant, 
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=frm" rel="me">FRANCIS MARION</a>.
